== Abstract == 
Julieta Cardinali (Spanish pronunciation: [xuˈljeta kaɾðiˈnali]; born October 21, 1977 in Buenos Aires) is an Argentine film and television actress.


== Filmography ==
Buenos Aires me mata (1998)
Una noche con Sabrina Love (2000)
Valentín (2002)
Dormir al sol (2003)
El Nominado (2003)
Un mundo menos peor (2004)
Un Buda (2005)
La Suerte está echada (2005)
La Antena (2007) ... aka The Aerial
¿De quién es el portaligas? (2007)
Fabian Road (2008)
Carta a Eva (2012)
Lectura Según Justino (2013)
"Ataud Blanco" (2017)


== Awards ==
Wins

Gramado Film Festival, Gramado, Brazil: Golden Kikito, Latin Film Competition - Best Actress, for Un Mundo menos peor; 2005.Nominations

Argentine Film Critics Association Awards: Silver Condor, Best New Actress, for Una Noche con Sabrina Love; 2001.
Argentine Film Critics Association Awards: Silver Condor, Best Supporting Actress, for Valentín; 2004.
